about_the_game:
Imagine: The Shining in a start-up as told by H.A.L. Nightmare Code is an independent sci-fi thriller about behavior recognition technology, behavior modification, 24/7 surveillance and artificial intelligence.

Directed by: Mark Netter
Produced by: Mark Netter, M.J. Rotondi, Craig Allen, Avi Bachar
Starring: Andrew J. West, Mei Melançon, Googy Gress, Ivan Shaw, Bret Roberts

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.

  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
